Class ReminderController

java.lang.Object
ReminderController
public class ReminderController extends Object
Controller class for managing reminder operations. Acts as an intermediary between the application and reminder data storage, handling business logic for reminder scheduling and notifications.
Author:
Omar Sayed

  • Constructor Details

    • ReminderController

      public ReminderController(ReminderDataBase database)
      Constructs a ReminderController with the specified database. Initializes the reminder notification system.
      Parameters:
      database - the ReminderDataBase instance to use for data operations

  • Method Details

    • addReminder

      public boolean addReminder(Reminder reminder)
      Adds a new reminder if its date is in the future. Automatically schedules the reminder notification upon successful creation.
      Parameters:
      reminder - the Reminder object to add
      Returns:
      true if the reminder was successfully added and scheduled, false otherwise

    • updateReminder

      public boolean updateReminder(Reminder reminder)
      Updates an existing reminder. Reschedules the notification if the reminder date is in the future.
      Parameters:
      reminder - the updated Reminder object
      Returns:
      true if the reminder was found and updated, false otherwise

    • deleteReminder

      public boolean deleteReminder(int userId, int reminderId)
      Deletes a reminder for a specific user. Cancels any pending notification before deletion.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user who owns the reminder
      reminderId - the ID of the reminder to delete
      Returns:
      true if the reminder was found and deleted, false otherwise

    • listReminders

      public List<Reminder> listReminders(int userId)
      Retrieves all reminders for a specific user.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user whose reminders to retrieve
      Returns:
      a List of Reminder objects belonging to the specified user
